definition: A statement given by an individual who has witnessed an event, typically provided in a legal or judicial context to provide evidence or testimony regarding the incident.

examples.german: Die Zeugenaussage war entscheidend fÃ¼r den Ausgang des Prozesses.
examples.english: The witness statement was crucial for the outcome of the trial.

examples.german: Der Zeuge wurde zur Zeugenaussage vor Gericht geladen.
examples.english: The witness was summoned to testify in court.

examples.german: Die Zeugenaussage widersprach den bisherigen Aussagen der Angeklagten.
examples.english: The witness testimony contradicted the previous statements of the defendants.

examples.german: Die Polizei nahm die Zeugenaussage auf Band auf.
examples.english: The police recorded the witness statement on tape.

examples.german: Der Richter befragte den Zeugen intensiv zu seiner Zeugenaussage.
examples.english: The judge questioned the witness extensively about his testimony.
